name: The Great EggQuake
description: An earthquake hit the land of the penguins and now its up to you to collect all the penguin eggs and bring them back together. can you collect them all or will you die trying. you control a penguin with a gun. the gun is for the boulders but they don't work on the holes. Dodge the holes and collect health, eggs and other fun collectibles. Play through and see what your high score will be.
